con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="Admission" targetNamespace="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/service/admission/1.0" xmlns:mes="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/service/admission/1.0" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8081/AdmissionService?xsd=xsd/SOA-Message-1.0.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="admitSubjectResponse"> <wsdl:part element="mes:admitSubjectResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="admitSubject"> <wsdl:part element="mes:admitSubject" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Admission"> <wsdl:operation name="admitSubject"> <wsdl:input message="tns:admitSubject"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:admitSubjectResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="AdmissionSoap" type="tns:Admission"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="admitSubject"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/service/admission/1.0/admitSubject"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="AdmissionService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:AdmissionSoap" name="AdmissionPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8081/AdmissionService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:mod="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0" xmlns:tns="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0"> <import namespace="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8081/AdmissionService?xsd=SOA-Model-1.0.xsd"/> <element name="admitSubject"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Referer"/> <element ref="mod:Referral"/> <element ref="mod:Subject"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="admitSubjectResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Episode"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="upsertPatient"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Subject"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="upsertPatientResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:PatientId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getPatient"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:PatientId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getPatientResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Patient"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="createEpisode"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:PatientId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="createEpisodeResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Episode"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="findEpisodes"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:PatientId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="findEpisodesResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="mod:Episode"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </schema>

<schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0"> <element name="Referer" type="tns:refererType"/> <element name="Referral" type="tns:referralType"/> <element name="Subject" type="tns:demographicType"/> <element name="Patient" type="tns:patientType"/> <element name="PatientId" type="tns:patientIdType"/> <element name="Episode" type="tns:episodeType"/> <element name="Bill" type="tns:billType"/> <complexType name="refererType"> <sequence> <element name="clientId" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="referralType"> <sequence> <sequence> <element name="procedure" type="tns:procedureType"/> </sequence> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="demographicType"> <sequence minOccurs="0"> <element name="nationalId" type="string"/> <element name="firstName" type="string"/> <element name="lastName" type="string"/> <element name="address1" type="string"/> <element name="address2" type="string"/> <element name="address3" type="string"/> <element name="nationality" type="string"/> <element name="gender" type="tns:genderType"/> <element name="dateOfBirth" type="date"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="patientType"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:demographicType"> <sequence> <element name="patientId" type="tns:patientIdType"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <simpleType name="patientIdType"> <restriction base="string"> <pattern value="\w+"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="episodeType"> <sequence> <element name="episodeId" type="string"/> <element ref="tns:PatientId"/> <element name="admission" type="tns:admissionType"/> <element name="startDate" type="date"/> <element name="endDate" type="date"/> <element name="care" type="tns:careType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="billType"> <sequence> <element name="costPerNight" type="string"/> <element name="initialStayEstimate" type="string"/> <element name="runningTotal" type="string"/> <element name="status"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Pending"/> <enumeration value="Complete"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="admissionType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Elective"/> <enumeration value="Emergency"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="careType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Private"/> <enumeration value="Public"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="procedureType"> <sequence> <element name="code" type="tns:procedureCodeType"/> <element name="admission" type="tns:admissionType"/> <element name="department" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="genderType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Male"/> <enumeration value="Female"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="procedureCodeType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="In-patient"/> <enumeration value="Day-patient"/> <enumeration value="Out-patient"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>
